channel.title: critical-reflections on a rope fastened between
channel.description: Recent content in critical-reflections on a rope fastened between

item.title:
Translation thesis submitted at ESIT:
_La Littérature Orale en Bretagne_ (Oral literature in Britanny)
item.description: This is the master’s thesis that I submitted at ESIT (École supérieure d’interprètes et de traducteurs) in June, 2021, towards a master’s in editorial, technical and financial translation. The thesis was written under the direction of Mme Marie-Paule Chamayou and was awarded a “mention excellente” (highest honors) with a grade of 19/20.

item.title: Reflections on André Jolles's *Simple Forms* – Part II
item.description: This is the second part of a critical review of 20th-century literary critic and art historian André Jolles’s Simple Forms and his attempt at theorizing “the totality of all literary art”.

item.title: *Une critique traductologique : pourquoi la théorie interprétative du sens ne peut expliquer la question de style, Partie II*
item.description: I present here a critique of the interpretive theory of meaning (la théorie interprétative du sens) proposed by French translation theorists Danica Seleskovitch and Marianne Lederer. This is the second part of my critique, and is excerpted from a thesis on translation that I wrote at ESIT in early 2021.

item.title: Reflections on André Jolles's *Simple Forms* – Part I
item.description: This is a critical review of 20th-century literary critic and art historian André Jolles’s Simple Forms and his attempt at theorizing “the totality of all literary art”.

item.title: *Une critique traductologique : pourquoi la théorie interprétative du sens ne peut expliquer la question de style, Partie I*
item.description: I present here a critique of the famous interpretive theory of meaning (la théorie interprétative du sens) proposed by French translation theorists Danica Seleskovitch and Marianne Lederer. This critique is excerpted from a thesis on translation that I wrote at ESIT in early 2021.
